name: Tax-free investments
shortDescription: Tax-free investments is a long-term savings vehicle to invest for the future and boost retirement savings
salesHighlights: 0% tax, including interest, dividends and capital gains
Access a wide range of funds
Flexible payment options and no casual event fees or penalties
0% tax on dividends, interest and capital gains
R33 000 limit per year or R500 000 per lifetime
Long-term investing but have easy access to your money in case of an emergency
Harness the power of long-term investing

productFeatures.name: Ideal investment for
productFeatures.description: Save for a specific goal or time period, but have easy access to your money
